alert.note: Alert for Clay; Lincoln; Union; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 3:20PM MDT until May 12 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Woodbury County in west central Iowa... Southwestern Sioux County in northwestern Iowa... Western Plymouth County in northwestern Iowa... Dakota County in northeastern Nebraska... Dixon County in northeastern Nebraska... Clay County in southeastern South Dakota... South central Lincoln County in southeastern South Dakota... Southeastern Yankton County in southeastern South Dakota... Union County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 420 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Yankton to 6 miles west of Dixon In Dixon County to 7 miles south of Stanton, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Concord and Dixon In Dixon County around 425 PM CDT. Wakefield around 430 PM CDT. Emerson, Allen, Newcastle, Meckling, Martinsburg and Maskell around 435 PM CDT. Vermillion and Ponca around 440 PM CDT. Elk Point, Homer, Hubbard, Jackson In Dakota County and Ponca State Park around 445 PM CDT. North Sioux City, Dakota City, Jefferson and Union Grove State Park around 450 PM CDT. Sioux City, Beresford, South Sioux City and Sergeant Bluff around 455 PM CDT. Akron, Sloan, Hinton, Lawton, Alcester and Merrill around 500 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Bronson, Chatsworth, Waterbury and Westfield. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
